title: Govt. does not approve LITRO gas price revision
body_lines: Govt. does not approve LITRO gas price revision The government has not approved the recent price revision of 12.5 kg domestic gas cylinder, LITRO Gas company said.
According to the government sources, there will be a gas price increase from tonight.
However, LITRO Gas said that they have not prepared to roll back the price increment.
Today LITRO Gas company said it will up the selling price of a 12.5 kg domestic gas cylinder from Rs.2,675 to Rs. 5,175 with effect from last night. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
